text: (nabiye! ovunta) oba mese pavasanu: “oba karana dæyak karanu. niyata vasayenma allahda, ohuge dutayada, anit visvasavantayinda, obage kriyavan balaminma sitinnaha. tavada rahasda, norahasda danna desata niyata vasayenma gena yanu labannehuya. oba karamin siti dæya (kebandu evadæyi yanna) e avasthavedi obata dænum denu æta”
